casebody.data:
PROGRESS ENERGY
v.
STRICKLAND. No. 118A07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 12, 2007. Norman W. Shearin, Jr., Kitty Hawk, for Strickland. Burley B. Mitchell, Jr., John C. Cooke, Raleigh, Elizabeth T. Smith, Garris Neal Yarborough, Fayetteville, for Progress Energy.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th day of April 2007 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendant (Strickland) shall have up to and including the 6th day of May 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 12th day of April 2007."
